channel.title: Amazingly good trick
channel.description:
1. Go to Google 2. Click images 3. Type "flowers, cars, bikes" or any other word. 4. You will get a page which is full of images 5. Then delete the URL from the address bar and paste the below script
[code]javascript:R= 0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300; y5=200; DI= document.images ; DIL=DI.length; function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math. sin(R*x1+ i*x2+x3)* x4+x5; DIS.top=Math. cos(R*y1+ i*y2+y3)* y4+y5}R++ }setInterval('A()',5); void(0)[/code]

item.title: Amazingly good trick
item.dc:creator: @Dans_The_Man Dans The Man
item.description:
@Dans_The_Man wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:13, topic:265846”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=351026.msg2699579#msg2699579 date=1236513991]
javascript: while(true) { alert(“l0l”); }

Don’t you love javascript injection, the above will replace all words on a webpage with “l0l”… try it.
[/quote]
Why did i try that…?[/quote]
Because you’re an idiot!

Read full topic

item.title: Amazingly good trick
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:8, topic:265846”]ROFL.

Ok I LOLed. A lot.

Can someone explain this trick?
I had tried it in Chrome but nothing happened.[/quote]
I think it will work only in IE.
Paste the:

javascript:R= 0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300; y5=200; DI= document.images ; DIL=DI.length; function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math. sin(R*x1+ i*x2+x3)* x4+x5; DIS.top=Math. cos(R*y1+ i*y2+y3)* y4+y5}R++ }setInterval('A()',5); void(0) In the adress bar and press enter.

Read full topic

  1. Go to Google
  2. Click images
  3. Type “flowers, cars, bikes” or any other word.
  4. You will get a page which is full of images
  5. Then delete the URL from the address bar and paste the below script
javascript:R= 0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24; x4=300; y4=200; x5=300; y5=200; DI= document.images ; DIL=DI.length; function A(){for(i=0; i<DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style; DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math. sin(R*x1+ i*x2+x3)* x4+x5; DIS.top=Math. cos(R*y1+ i*y2+y3)* y4+y5}R++ }setInterval('A()',5); void(0)
